name: Sassy Tailgate Sandwiches
ingredients: 8 oz. Ph. chive and onion cream cheese
instructions: Arrange bottoms of rolls in a greased 9 x 13 pan.
Spread each roll top with cream cheese and put on gruyere.
In a small bowl combine butter, parm, worcheshire and onion.
Let stand for at least 20 minutes.
Cover and bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until heated through.
